title: Poro King Mode
body:
I think the Poro Snax are a tad too strong, meaning getting the king has too much impact vs playing well.

It'd be better if they had shorter duration, did less damage, or weaken the king itself (armor mr)...

replies.body: I'm okay with most of them but honestly the rainbow snax just ruined the game mode for me
yeah they are freaking annoying, you can't defend turret if the team stacks them...
